about_the_game:
15 years ago, deep within the Amazon rainforest, a team of archaeologists discovered an ancient temple belonging to an unknown civilization.

Dwelling inside lies an artifact of mysterious power as well as a series of messages in an unknown language.

An exciting discovery at the time soon leads to the downfall of society as we know it.
Years later a man by the name of Liam decides to step up and uncover the truth behind the events that have befallen the world.

Will he be able to uncover the truth that has eluded society since the incident?
detailed_description:
15 years ago, deep within the Amazon rainforest, a team of archaeologists discovered an ancient temple belonging to an unknown civilization.

Dwelling inside lies an artifact of mysterious power as well as a series of messages in an unknown language.

An exciting discovery at the time soon leads to the downfall of society as we know it.
Years later a man by the name of Liam decides to step up and uncover the truth behind the events that have befallen the world.

Will he be able to uncover the truth that has eluded society since the incident?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip

name: Élan Vital

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip

short_description: Élan Vital is a visual novel. The story is given form through the backgrounds, characters, sound, and music to create a novel for the reader to enjoy. Readers view the story from the standpoint of the protagonist, Liam.
